name: E-scape (Aalto University - Game Design, Sarah Alirezaee)
name_original: E-scape (Aalto University - Game Design, Sarah Alirezaee)
description:
E-scape is a puzzle game where the player must escape from a prison using his digital double. 

Lari Tarvainen - Artist
Sina Jalali - Programmer Ida
Iskala - Programmer
Emil Sana - Sounds and music
Sarah Alirezaee - Game Designer
